page.title: 10The White Horse Public House
page.content: This is a pretty black and white pub in Tea Green.It opens on Mondays to Saturdays 10.30 am to 2.30 pm. and 5.30 pm. till 11pm. On Sundays it opens from 12 noon till 2pm. and 7pm. till 10.30pm. Their customers are young couples between the ages of twenty and thirty with their young children. Luton is not very far away6 from this pub so very often airport staff,and French and German travellers come here at lunchtimes.Vauxhall Motor Industry in Luton is only one mile away and many of mtheir workers use this pub. Sixteen people work here,all with different jobs, 2 cleaners,5 kitchen staff,3 waitresses,5 bar staff and the owner.The White Horse sells food at lunchtimes and in the evening.The menu changes each day, but in general at lunchtimes they offer pies,chicken
